location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to James Farish, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter concerns advances made to Fort William, Calcutta and Fort St George, Madras, along with the British Mission to the Court of Persia. It also requests further clarification on how Jaffer Ali Khan's [Ja‘afar ‘Alī Khān] pension should be paid.
